lovely.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You look lovely in that dress.
He was a lovely little boy.
lovely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Thank you for a lovely evening.
That was a lovely cup of tea.
lovely.translation[0].definitions[3].def: used to say that something is not at all enjoyable or good
lovely.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: ‘The cat threw up all over the carpet!’ ‘Lovely!’
You’ve made a lovely mess in here.
lovely.translation[0].definitions[4].def: used to show that you are pleased with something
lovely.translation[0].definitions[4].exa: Push it right across. That’s it, lovely.
